title: A body on a Cornish beach:  Episode 87
description:
February 2014, Perranporth Cornwall.   When the body of a man washed up on the beach, detectives appeal for help to identify the man.  In this episode of the UK True Crime Weekly Podcast we follow the Police investigation as suspect a suspicious death due to a series of strange events leading up to the death of 64 year old Alan Jeal.

Have you enjoyed the podcast and want more? Listen to 17 bonus episodes plus other exclusive content at www.patreon.com/uktruecrime  

Want to talk about the show or any other aspect of UK True Crime? Join over 1100 others on our friendly facebook group today: https://m.facebook.com/groups/1479468325433430  

www.uktruecrime.com
